pullRequest.title: DEV-1122 Add CRAM conversion to pipeline

commit.message: DEV-1122 Add CRAM conversion to pipeline

nodes.bodyText: I think the Substage interface would work well for this
I see we add the CRAM here to the final output I guess we want to remove the BAM from the aligner report components as well?
Or maybe you were thinking we persist both to start?
I think we should have an option to enable/disable this feature

commit.message:
DEV-1122 Put CRAM output behind feature toggle

Also fix a bug in the image import script that I noticed while pushing
the image for manual testing.

In addition add some options to the InputFileDescriptor class to
significantly improve download speed for batch files. Also scale down
the required disk space for the batch converter.
DEV-1122 Do not store BAMs when outputting CRAMs

DEV-1122 Don't copy new BAMs after CRAM finishes

The CRAM conversion generates a BAM from the new CRAM and then
compares that to the original. These are not generally useful
to copy up to the cloud, but we do want to keep them around if
there is anything out of ordinary. Move them to another folder
so they aren't automatically copied up on job completion.

nodes.bodyText: 0.1 implies its not ready for production, would suggest we use 1.0 once its validated (which I think it sort of is by Korneel)

commit.message:
DEV-1122 Improve batch operation naming

Also bump bamcomp version to 1.0.

DEV-1122 Fix failing test

Bump the bamcomp version in the test
